attributes.action: Allow Perth and North Perthshire a referendum
attributes.additional_details: in any future Scottish independence referendum and Scotland votes to leave the UK Perth and North Perthshire should be allowed to have a referendum to decide if it wants to remain part of the UK or an independent Scotland
attributes.background: If Scotland votes to leave the UK Perth and North Perthshire should be allowed to decide if it wants to remain in the UK or a part of an independent Scotland

rejection.details:
A number of attempts have been made to start petitions making requests similar to this petition, using what appear to be fake names and email addresses.

We can only consider a petition if the creator has started it using their full, legal name, so if you would like to proceed with your petition please can you contact us at petitionscommittee@parliament.uk so we can verify your identity.
